channel.title: Tricks on Sander Schutten's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tricks on Sander Schutten's Blog

item.title: Custom profile images in Edge
item.description: Ever since Microsoft announced the next version of Edge will be based on Chromium and provided the Edge Insider program I’ve been happily running the Dev channel of Edge. If you haven’t tried yet, you should. It’s that good. One of the benefits of the Chromium based Edge is that it brings profiles to Edge. Profiles are great, because they allow you to have separate profiles for different purposes, e.g. a work profile and a personal profile.
